Declan Grant

About Me

Hi, I'm Dec. This is a portfolio page created as part of The Odin Project to practice responsive design. This is very much a work in progress, I'll professionalise it once I've finished the course.

My background is in Data Science and Engineering. Currently I work in the commercial team at a tech startup.

I've never known how to build apps which has always felt like a lacking skillset so I'm here now.

You can checkout my LinkedIn, Github or previous Odin projects below.

Fair warning they can be pretty rough and tumble - I'm trying this stuff for the first time.

Previous Odin Projects*

*these are the ones with nice UI's - the rest are on GitHub

Battleships

An interactive Battleships game built with vanilla javascript, html and css. Finally got my head around classes on this one.

Droplet

This is a basic Weather App - It was the first introduction to APIs.

Task Mastered

This one's a pretty simple Todo list web app. I based the layout off trello (columns for each project). This one was to learn about factory functions.

Noughts and Crosses

This is noughts and crosses. Not much more to it than that.
